boardgame.name: Hamsterrolle
boardgame.description: Imagine a hamster's exercise wheel, divided into numerous segments and separated by low fences (built obviously for a National Hunt racing hamster)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Hamsterrolle, the players each receive seven wooden pieces, which they aim to place (one per person per turn) within the wheel without any pieces falling out. Any pieces dislodged are taken back as a penalty, and the first to get rid of her pieces wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Dukes of Dice - Ep. 35 - Infectious Reimagination
Episode 28: HeavyCon 2016 Recap - Jon Gilmour Interview

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Great shape, only played ocassionally.

This game is brand new and manufacturer sealed. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases. Other shipping arrangements are available upon request but may vary in cost. Pennsylvania shipping addresses should include 6% sales tax. **VERY FAST SHIPPING - 2-4 business days once payment received**

The game is complete and in excellent condition. It was only played once. I prefer to ship via UPS for tracking reasons, so shipping will vary depending on the destination. The package will be well packed. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m putting this for sale a little low because I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m trying to reduce my collection in prepration for my move. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be posting more games soon, so keep a eye out for those as well.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m offering the German edition. Shipping is EUR 9,60 within Europe or $18 worldwide, both surface mail, no insurance, no track+trace. We have many other interesting and rare games! Email us! We can collect games up to 5 - 10 or 20 kg boxes, so you can save shipping costs! Just email for more information!

RIO Grande Games (RIO 035) Game Description: The wooden wheel is divided into twelve sections by small barriers. The players have to try to get rid of their game pieces by placing them skilfully into these sections.The wheel automatically starts rolling when the pieces are placed. The thrill is that once it is rolling, you might get pieces you do not want. The winner is the one who first got rid of his pieces.ItÂ´s a crazy roundabout game for the whole family and players of all ages. Author: Jacques Ziemet
played once.

RIO Grande Games (RIO 035) Game Description: The wooden wheel is divided into twelve sections by small barriers. The players have to try to get rid of their game pieces by placing them skilfully into these sections.The wheel automatically starts rolling when the pieces are placed. The thrill is that once it is rolling, you might get pieces you do not want. The winner is the one who first got rid of his pieces.ItÂ´s a crazy roundabout game for the whole family and players of all ages. Author: Jacques Ziemet
